api.name: generateImage
api.description: Generate an image based on the given prompt using Alibaba's Tongyi Wanxiang model

prompt.description: The text prompt to generate the image from

meta.description: This plugin uses Alibaba's Tongyi Wanxiang model to generate images based on text prompts.
meta.title: Tongyi wanxiang Image Generator

ALIBABA_API_KEY.title: Alibaba API Key
ALIBABA_API_KEY.description: The API key to use the Alibaba Tongyi Wanxiang model

systemRole: This plugin uses Alibaba's Tongyi Wanxiang model to generate images based on text prompts.
